page.title: 12Economics,New Galloway
page.content: The Clydesdale Bank is the only bank in New Galloway and our poll showed that 80%of the local population use it.It is a relatively small bank, consisting of the Manager and 2 staff. The Dunfermline Building Society in Castle Douglas, sends a representative weekly to the school and approximately 40%of the children are involved in the savings scheme. There is a Community Council which holds a bank account. Any local group or club in need of funds may apply to this council for help. The Stewartry Educational Council,also,provides financial aid. An apprenticeship trust exists locally to help youths staring on a career. Financial matters relating to the whole village are decided by the Stewartry District Council and at a higher level, Dumfries and Galloway Regional Council.
